H0.text: Balance is the tool a carpenter should use to measure the length of a wooden board.

H1.text: Meter stick is the tool a carpenter should use to measure the length of a wooden board.

H2.text: Thermometer is the tool a carpenter should use to measure the length of a wooden board.

H3.text: A graduated cylinder is the tool a carpenter should use to measure the length of a wooden board.

A4.text: A metre-stick is either a straightedge or foldable ruler used to measure length, and is especially common in the construction industry.

A5.text: Modern carpenters' metre-sticks are usually made to be folded for ease of transport.
